statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number > 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address='0x123456789';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE receiver_address='0x987654321';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '0xABCDEF' ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number < 500;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT time_stamp, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY amount DESC, time_stamp ASC;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, num_transactions FROM block_metadata WHERE num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address != recipient_address;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount, time_stamp FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT block_number, block_timestamp, num_transactions FROM block_metadata WHERE num_transactions > 50 ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, time_stamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM block_metadata JOIN transaction_history ON block_metadata.block_number = transaction_history.block_number WHERE transaction_history.amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number = 500
SELECT timestamp, block_number, transaction_hash FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM block WHERE block_number = 1000
SELECT address_id, address FROM address ORDER BY address_id
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '0x1234567890' AND receiver_address = '0xabcdef1234'
SELECT block_number, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM block ORDER BY block_number ASC
SELECT address_id, address FROM address WHERE address_id < 100 ORDER BY address_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM block_header WHERE previous_block_id IS NULL;
SELECT timestamp, block_id, merkle_root FROM block_header ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT blockchain_id, total_transactions, total_blocks FROM blockchain WHERE total_blocks > 50;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND receiver_address = '0x456def';
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM blockchain ORDER BY total_blocks DESC, total_transactions ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT block_hash, timestamp FROM block_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_address, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_sent FROM transaction_history GROUP BY sender_address ORDER BY total_sent DESC;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, previous_hash FROM block_data WHERE block_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
